concept.title: Discover Dweb
concept.shortdesc: Welcome to the decentralized web. Dweb technology experimentation resulted in this website. Navigate through this landing page to access concepts, frequently asked questions and technical shares about the Dweb.

conbody.p: You are currently using dweb and viewing HTML pages on the Interplanetary File System, IPFS. As a result, this entire website's content is decentralized, replicated, and its authenticity and provenance are verifiable.
Technology stack: DITA XML, DITA Open Toolkit, Github, Python, Fleek, and IPFS.

Disclaimer: I am affiliated with the Dweb movement. I am not affiliated with Protocol Labs, Filecoin, Fleek, Github, or any of their associated projects. I have not been paid or compensated by any entity to create or maintain this website. All content on this site is independent and created solely for informational purposes.
